chapter.text: 78|1|Nanigoto ni tsuite, kare-ra wa tazune au no ka.
78|2|Idaina shosoku ni tsui te.
78|3|Sore ni tsuite, kare-ra wa iken ga kotonaru.
78|4|Iya, kare-ra wa yagate shirou.
78|5|Iya, iya, kare-ra wa yagate shirudearou.
78|6|Ware wa daichi o, hirobiro to shinakatta ka.
78|7|Mata yamayama o, kui to shitate wanai ka.
78|8|Ware wa anata gata o ryosei ni tsukuri,
78|9|mata kyusoku no tame, anata gata no suimin o sadame,
78|10|yoru o oi to shi,
78|11|hiru o seikei no shudan to shite sadameta.
78|12|Mata ware wa, anata gata no ue ni kengo ni 7-so (no ten) o uchi-date,
78|13|teru ya kashi tomoshi hi o (sono naka ni) oki,
78|14|ware wa kumo kara yutaka ni ame o furase,
78|15|sore ni yotte, kara-mono ya yasai o moe dasa se,
78|16|samazamana en o shigera seru.
78|17|Hontoni sabaki no hi wa sadame rarete ite,
78|18|sonohi, rappa ga fuka reruto anata gata wa gun o nashite detekuru.
78|19|Ten wa aka rete kazukazu no mon to nari,
78|20|yamayama wa utsusa rete shinkiro no yo ni naru.
78|21|Hontoni jigoku wa, machibuse no badeari,
78|22|haishin-sha no ochitsuku tokoro,
78|23|kare-ra wa itsumademo sono naka ni sumudearou.
78|24|Sokode suzushi-sa mo ajiwaezu,(don'na) nomimono mo nai,
78|25|nietagiru yu to no no soto ni wa.
78|26|(Kare-ra no tame) fusawashi hoshodearu.
78|27|Hontoni kare-ra wa,(sono okonai ni taisuru) seisan o kibo shinaide ita.
78|28|Mata kare-ra wa waga shirushi o usodearu to itte, tsuyoku kyohi shita.
78|29|Ware wa issai no koto o, ten no sho ni tomete iru.
78|30|Dakara anata gata wa (jibun no okonai no kekka o) ajiwae. Ware wa chobatsu o zoka suru bakaridearu.
78|31|Hontoni omo o osoreru mono ni wa, anzen'na basho (rakuen) ga aru.
78|32|Midori no en ya, budo-en,
78|33|mune no fukureta onaji toshigoro no otome-tachi,
78|34|mata naminamito afureru hai.
78|35|Sokode wa tsumaranu hanashi ya itsuwarigoto o kikanai.
78|36|Korera wa anata no nushi kara no hosho, tamamono no kessandearu.
78|37|Ten to ji, soshite sonoaida no subete no mono no shu, jihibukaki okata (kara no tamamonodeari), dare mo kare ni katarikakeru koto wa dekinai.
78|38|Seirei to tenshi-tachi ga, seiretsu shite tatsu hi, jihibukaki okata kara o yurushi o ete tadashi koto o iu mono igai ni wa, dare mo kuchi o kiku koto ga dekinai.
78|39|Sore wa shinjitsu no hidearu. Dakara dare demo nozomu mono wa,-nushi no omoto ni modoruga i.

78|40|Hontoni ware wa, chobatsu ga chikai to, anata gata ni keikoku shita. Sonohi, hito wa, jibun no ryoho no te ga maemotte itta mono (shogyo) o mirudearou. Fushin-sha wa,`a , nasakenai, watashi ga chirideattanaraba.' To iudearou.
